title: Order Of The Lotus Karma

embed.description: Another League of Legends fanart c: I worked really hard on this one cause Karma is my main and I looooooove this skin c: Hope you like it g... Order Of The Lotus Karma

body:
https://img00.deviantart.net/3091/i/2018/247/1/d/order_of_the_lotus_karma_by_tarnexart-dcm0a5p.jpg 

I hope you like my OOTL Karma fanart
She is my main and I really wanted to draw her as anime character c: 

What do you think guys? 

Btw Riot notice me pls xd
{{sticker:cass-cry}}

replies.body: I have alerted the reddit troops! {{sticker:darius-angry}}

> [{quoted}](name=ARE YOU PC BRO,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=n4d5Zl9Y,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-09-04T15:52:50.081+0000)
>
> I have alerted the reddit troops! {{sticker:darius-angry}}

Can confirm, saw this on Reddit. This is so beautiful ❤️ Order of the Lotus Karma is so near and dear to my heart. 

Do you have a Twitter account, @Tarnex? :)

OMG this can't be real xd 

Thank you so much, you have no ideas how happy this comment made me <3

I don't have Twitter account but I can make one right away :')

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Stellari,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=n4d5Zl9Y,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2018-09-04T16:23:17.451+0000)
>
> Can confirm, saw this on Reddit. This is so beautiful ❤️ Order of the Lotus Karma is so near and dear to my heart. 
> 
> Do you have a Twitter account, @Tarnex? :)

It's always nice to network/share on reddit eh? {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

https://curlysimmer.files.wordpress.com/2016/03/youre-my-hero-meme.jpg 

{{sticker:sg-soraka}}
You should also do a Syndra one. She need an home world skin.

Not the place for this Discussion. 
We're here talking about the Artwork that this person made, not the Kerfuffle going on.
Not all Rioters are to blame, just like not all men are what Daniel claims.
Thank you so much! {{sticker:sg-kiko}}
This is actually really amazing!  Did you have a specific ability in mind with that energy around her?
Thank you so much! It's her shield tho I didn't do details like in game, I wanted to make it a bit more like anime {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
I love this! This and Warden are my favorite Karma skins, so I always love to see art of them!!
I will probably do every Karma skin, she is interesting and fun to draw :3
I'm imagining her in this stance while saying "I know your spirit, but I must stop your heart!" to the enemy. I love your art, Tarnex. Please draw some more Karma ones :)
Very nice.  If it was stylized closer to the games art tone would make a decent splash art.

I really like the action this fan art has. It feels like I am some champion on botlane who is about to get blasted by her Mantra Q. Makes you want to panically dodge.

Love it!

I don't play Karma, but this is a really nice piece of Artwork.
{{sticker:garen-swing}}

wow 5.6k views on reddit already {{champion:43}} 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

I will remember you when I become famous my friend!(nice dream :')) :') 

Wish you were on EUNE too so we can play some games! {{sticker:sg-zephyr}}

> [{quoted}](name=Tarnex,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=n4d5Zl9Y,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-09-04T18:51:30.159+0000)
>
> I will remember you when I become famous my friend!(nice dream :')) :') 
> 
> Wish you were on EUNE too so we can play some games! {{sticker:sg-zephyr}}

heheh I'm a Karma Main too :P 
If you creep my post history you'll see me in the N.A. boards once in awhile posting about her 
My proudest posts are the KARMA PUN SONGS <3 
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/UAqfPgGQ-karma-by-laner-del-rey
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/f5JhBEXv-bodak-botlane-karma

haha lol im lame

Damn they are cool, gotta save them! 
Karma is fun to play, tho I never planed to play her at all - told my bro to buy me Akali when he showed me game for the first time and he got me Karma acidentally so, here I am! xd almost one million points xd {{sticker:sg-kiko}}
Karma is hot enough for that one, for sure xd
Great job!
Thank you so much {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
